        ('-0.1', '+', '-0.2', '-0.3', '-0.1 - 0.2 ='),
    ])
    def test_calculator_negative_number_operations(setup_calculator, num1, operation, num2, expected_result,
                                                   expected_expression):
        """Parametrized test for calculator operations involving negative numbers"""
        log.info(f" 'test_calculator_negative_number_operations' for {num1} {operation} {num2} has started")
    
        calculator = setup_calculator
        perform_operation(calculator, num1, operation, num2)
>       assert_results(calculator, expected_result, expected_expression)
